container.artificial-construct.title: Internal Compartment
container.beaver.title: Mouth Storage
container.blob.title: Inside You
container.felvaxian.title: Scavenger Pouch
container.ninetails.title: Pocket
container.shadow.title: Shadow Storage
container.spirit-ram.title: Horn Pocket
container.wanderer.title: Travel Pouch
container.warper.title: "Ender Chest"
origin.origins-plus-plus.alien_axolotl.d: You are an alien who reveres the Golden Space Gods and has crash-landed onto this planet.
origin.origins-plus-plus.anomaly.descrip: Once an ancient star, you now exist as an unstable form of pure energy.
origin.origins-plus-plus.anomaly.name: Anomaly
origin.origins-plus-plus.artificial_cons: A creation born from the blend of simple redstone components and complex machinery to form a living being.
origin.origins-plus-plus.automaton.descr: Machines built by a long-lost civilization that were kept in a capsule that eroded quite recently. They now wander this earth without the fear of death.
origin.origins-plus-plus.automaton.name: Automaton
origin.origins-plus-plus.beaver.descript: Beavers are large, semi-aquatic rodents in the genus §ocastor§r that are native to the temperate northern hemisphere.
origin.origins-plus-plus.beaver.name: Beaver
origin.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.desc: An unyielding being with the durability of bedrock itself.
origin.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.name: Bedrockean
origin.origins-plus-plus.binturong.descr: A binturong is an arboreal creature, often referred to as a bear cat.
origin.origins-plus-plus.binturong.name: Binturong
origin.origins-plus-plus.birb.descriptio: Birbs are small and very cute. They can also fly and chirp.
origin.origins-plus-plus.birb.name: Birb
origin.origins-plus-plus.blazian.descrip: A better version of the Blazeborn origin!
origin.origins-plus-plus.blazian.name: Blazian
origin.origins-plus-plus.blob.descriptio: You are some kind of blob; you do not know anything about yourself, but you seem to know already about the world around you.
origin.origins-plus-plus.blob.name: Blob
origin.origins-plus-plus.boarling.descri: This tough-skinned race relying on brute strength to navigate through life.
origin.origins-plus-plus.boarling.name: Boarling
origin.origins-plus-plus.broodmother.des: An elder of the arachnid colonies, capable of great destruction. Often feared by those who utter the name.
origin.origins-plus-plus.calamitous_rogu: You lurk in the shadows, waiting for just the right moment to strike. Luckily for you (unlike the average rogue), you are skilled in ambush tactics.
origin.origins-plus-plus.candyperson.des: A sugar-like entity that has a serious problem with sweet food!
origin.origins-plus-plus.child_of_cthulh: As a descendant of the great Cthulhu, you wield ancient, otherworldly powers.
origin.origins-plus-plus.chimaera.descri: Dark Inquisitors made with eldritch and draconic magic to hunt demons and the undead. You are what we in the biz call 'chaotic good'; however, beware that, when fighting monsters, you yourself do not become a monster...
origin.origins-plus-plus.chimaera.name: Chimaera
origin.origins-plus-plus.cobra.descripti: A small yet venomous cobra, ready to strike with its poisonous fangs.
origin.origins-plus-plus.cobra.name: Cobra
origin.origins-plus-plus.copper_golem.de: A golem comprised entirely of copper, 'tis a sturdy machine.
origin.origins-plus-plus.corrupted_withe: You were experimented on by scientists and were exposed to Dragon's Breath. You killed the scientists, but not before the experiment was complete...
origin.origins-plus-plus.craftsman.descr: Heir to a long lineage of skilled artisans and knights, you excel in craftsmanship.
origin.origins-plus-plus.craftsman.name: Craftsman
origin.origins-plus-plus.dark_mage.descr: An evil practitioner of dark magic, driven by hatred for happiness and life itself.
origin.origins-plus-plus.dark_mage.name: Dark Mage
origin.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn.desc: A necromancer with dominion over the afterlife, commanding the forces of death.
origin.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn.name: Deathsworn
origin.origins-plus-plus.demi_god.descri: Through relentless training, you’ve transcended mortal limits, rivaling even the strongest foes.
origin.origins-plus-plus.demi_god.name: Demi-God
origin.origins-plus-plus.deranged.descri: You are a troubled human, coming from a rotten and horrible family that hurt you when you were young. You came to think that this was the norm, and became mentally unsound.
origin.origins-plus-plus.deranged.name: Deranged
origin.origins-plus-plus.devine_architec: Long ago, before the formation of the Minecraft universe, there were groups of architects that constructed each element of the universe. They all worked together to construct all the blocks and biomes of the universe, but eventually they all went extinct once their jobs had finished. All except for you...
origin.origins-plus-plus.dolphin.descrip: Graceful aquatic creatures known for their playful nature and affinity for the ocean.
origin.origins-plus-plus.dolphin.name: Dolphin
origin.origins-plus-plus.drakonwither.de: The child of the Wither and the Ender Dragon, you are an unnatural anomaly full of powers unknown to man. Alive for hundreds of years and once worshipped by many.
origin.origins-plus-plus.dullahan.descri: You are an ancient horseman, harbinger of death and slavery, using your binding chains and horse to kill your victims.
origin.origins-plus-plus.dullahan.name: Dullahan
origin.origins-plus-plus.earth_spirit.de: A spiritual being that rises from the depths of earth using stone and soil to make a physical body.
origin.origins-plus-plus.earth_spirit_tw: The spiritual form of the earth spirit.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ebon_wing.descr: Ebon-Wings are winged creatures often seen hunting for prey by themselves or with Blood-Horns.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ebon_wing.name: Ebon-Wing
origin.origins-plus-plus.emblazing_warri: A Nether entity sent to the Overworld to cause chaos and disruption. Your powers are tied to your injuries.
origin.origins-plus-plus.end_mage.descri: An ancient mage who studied End creatures and sought event to become one.
origin.origins-plus-plus.end_mage.name: End Mage
origin.origins-plus-plus.enigma.descript: Mystery... puzzles... trickery... You make people live in fear and question their own sanity.
origin.origins-plus-plus.enigma.name: Enigma
origin.origins-plus-plus.fallen_angel.de: After spending an eternity in hell, you’ve escaped and seek revenge upon the world.
origin.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian.descr: A feline-raven hybrid, skilled in soaring and pouncing on unsuspecting prey.
origin.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian.name: Felvaxian
origin.origins-plus-plus.flea.name: Flea
origin.origins-plus-plus.frog.descriptio: Your frog character has certain traits deriving from your frog ancestry.
origin.origins-plus-plus.frog.name: Frog
origin.origins-plus-plus.gaia.descriptio: You are the mother of all nature, a goddess of earth with a passion for the flowers you have created.
origin.origins-plus-plus.gaia.name: Gaia
origin.origins-plus-plus.ghast.descripti: Spirits of players who died in the Nether, yearning to find a way back home.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ghast.name: Ghast
origin.origins-plus-plus.giant.descripti: An ancient race, now a rare sight in the modern age. Their history remains unknown, with few left to keep it alive.
origin.origins-plus-plus.giant.name: Giant
origin.origins-plus-plus.glacier.descrip: A mystical creature born out of snow and ice. You were created out of the cold and have lived long enough to know that the cold can kill all.
origin.origins-plus-plus.glacier.name: Glacier
origin.origins-plus-plus.gnoll.descripti: A formidable, temperamental scavenger, known for its brute strength and fearsome presence.
origin.origins-plus-plus.gnoll.name: Gnoll
origin.origins-plus-plus.golden_golem.de: A mystical golem created by Illagers using gold and totems of undying.
origin.origins-plus-plus.goolien.descrip: A gelatinous alien species often mistaken for their earthly slime counterparts.
origin.origins-plus-plus.goolien.name: Goolien
origin.origins-plus-plus.half_wither.des: A hybrid entity with the power of both human and wither lineage.
origin.origins-plus-plus.hellforged.desc: Born in hellfire in the darkest depths of hell, this entity thrives off intense heat but freezes rapidly in colder environments.
origin.origins-plus-plus.hellforged.name: Hellforged
origin.origins-plus-plus.hero_of_the_wil: A versatile explorer with abilities finely tuned for adventure.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ice_king.descri: Hailing from the frozen north and descending from the legendary Ice Queen, you has grown accustomed to the cold.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ice_king.name: Ice King
origin.origins-plus-plus.ice_porcupine.d: Once a natural creature, you were corrupted by demonic energies, giving you command over ice.
origin.origins-plus-plus.iceling.descrip: An evolved form of the inchling, perfectly suited to the cold.
origin.origins-plus-plus.iceling.name: Iceling
origin.origins-plus-plus.ignisian.descri: Archdemons exiled after the rebellion. Weakened by the retribution, the betrayed Ignisians were driven to the shadows. Day by day, their power grows, and soon, vengeance will be theirs.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ignisian.name: Ignisian
origin.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/illu: Through mastering the art of the bow, you have advanced to an Illusioner Apprentice with newfound powers. (Evolve with 'The End?')
You have unlocked your true potential as a Master Illusioner.
You have mastered the art of illusion and have unlocked your true potential.
You were created but never used, so now it's time to take revenge! (Evolve with 'We Need to Go Deeper')
You have mastered the bow and have evolved into an Illusioner Apprentice.
origin.origins-plus-plus.insect.descript: People adapted to coexist with insects.
origin.origins-plus-plus.insect.name: Insect
origin.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish.descr: Ethereal aquatic creatures that paralyze prey with venomous stings.
origin.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish.name: Jellyfish
origin.origins-plus-plus.kelperet.descri: When a Heart of the Sea falls into the ocean, it can get tangled up in kelp, forming a small living being called a Kelperet.
origin.origins-plus-plus.kelperet.name: Kelperet
origin.origins-plus-plus.kirin.descripti: A majestic blend of feline and fox origins, elevated with unmatched grace and power.
origin.origins-plus-plus.kirin.name: Kirin
origin.origins-plus-plus.land_shark.desc: A ferocious predator at home in both water and land.
origin.origins-plus-plus.land_shark.name: Land Shark
origin.origins-plus-plus.light_mage.desc: A practitioner of healing magic, the light mage excels in support but lacks physical prowess.
origin.origins-plus-plus.light_mage.name: Light Mage
You were once a strong warrior for the draconian race that lived in the End; however, during a war in the Overworld, you were killed. Many years later you awaken to find yourself alive once again in the form of a lost draconian spirit.
origin.origins-plus-plus.lunar_path.desc: An undead being with immense power tied to the moonlit path.
origin.origins-plus-plus.lunar_path.name: Lunar Path
origin.origins-plus-plus.magmean.descrip: Oozy, fiery, bouncy—what's not to love?
origin.origins-plus-plus.magmean.name: Magmean
origin.origins-plus-plus.malfunction.des: A glitch in the matrix has given you stupidly useful trolling powers.
origin.origins-plus-plus.manipulator.des: Specialists in elemental magic, harnessing the energies of the creatures and environment around you.
origin.origins-plus-plus.moth.name: Moth
origin.origins-plus-plus.mothling.descri: Winged, moth-like creatures that originally evolved in taiga biomes before adapting and spreading to the rest of the Overworld.
origin.origins-plus-plus.mothling.name: Mothling
origin.origins-plus-plus.mountain_goat.d: Fiercely territorial, they often ram unfamiliar people off of their cliff habitats.
origin.origins-plus-plus.mouse.name: Mouse
origin.origins-plus-plus.ninetails.descr: Legend has it that Ninetails came into being when nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ninetails.name: Ninetails
origin.origins-plus-plus.panoptican.desc: Ethereal airborne watchers, they collect and observe but never intervene.
origin.origins-plus-plus.panoptican.name: Panoptican
origin.origins-plus-plus.part_robot.desc: A hybrid creation, blending the best of human and machine.
origin.origins-plus-plus.part_robot.name: Part-Robot
origin.origins-plus-plus.pixie.descripti: Playful and mischievous, you are an elf-like spirit.
origin.origins-plus-plus.pixie.name: Pixie
origin.origins-plus-plus.ram.description: A powerful ram, charging headlong into obstacles and adversaries.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ram.name: Ram
origin.origins-plus-plus.raptus.descript: Descendants of velociraptors, nowadays these creatures can be found hunting in packs or resting.
origin.origins-plus-plus.raptus.name: Raptus
origin.origins-plus-plus.rat.description: You are a small critter of the night. You hunt and appear filthy to others.
origin.origins-plus-plus.rat.name: Rat
origin.origins-plus-plus.ravager.descrip: You are an illager experiment, something between their normal kind and the massive illager beasts known as ravagers.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ravager.name: Ravager
origin.origins-plus-plus.red_panda.descr: The 'prowl' as the jungle’s most adorable predator.
origin.origins-plus-plus.red_panda.name: Red Panda
origin.origins-plus-plus.reign_farmer.de: A master farmer, your decades of experience have honed every aspect.
origin.origins-plus-plus.rift_mage.descr: Legends call Rift Mages 'The Immortals'. Their control over space and time reigns supreme, able to defy even the Grim Reaper himself.
origin.origins-plus-plus.rift_mage.name: Rift Mage
origin.origins-plus-plus.ryu.description: A celestial being born of divine origins, embodying majesty and power.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ryu.name: Ryū
origin.origins-plus-plus.sand_walker.des: A nomad of the dunes, forever traversing the endless desert sands.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shadow.descript: One with the shadows, you move unseen.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shadow.name: Shadow
Once human, you adapted to the void-like dimension you were trapped in for hundreds of years.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shifter.descrip: You stole the powers from the original nine origins and can now switch between weaker forms of them.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shifter.name: Shifter
origin.origins-plus-plus.shroomling.desc: After killing the Ender Dragon, you have grown to your final form: a small mushroom. Your spore count has increased dramatically, making all spore-related abilities stronger.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shroomling.name: Shroomling
origin.origins-plus-plus.snake.name: Snake
origin.origins-plus-plus.soul_seer.descr: You are a mostly soul-like being relying on a soul well to stay in top shape.
origin.origins-plus-plus.soul_seer.name: Soul-Seer
origin.origins-plus-plus.spectre.descrip: Archangels corrupted by the devil during the war. The curse stripped off their wings and made them ravenous for flesh. They now roam aimlessly, hoping to regain their former glory.
origin.origins-plus-plus.spectre.name: Spectre
origin.origins-plus-plus.spirit_ram.desc: A spectral ram that has returned to Earth as a spirit to help people on their journey.
origin.origins-plus-plus.spirit_ram.name: Spirit Ram
origin.origins-plus-plus.sporeling.descr: A tiny, floaty, mushroom-person that came out of the ground and started doing stuff. (Evolve with 'Free the End')
origin.origins-plus-plus.sporeling.name: Sporeling
origin.origins-plus-plus.sporeling.upgra: After killing the Ender Dragon, you have grown into your final form: a small mushroom!
origin.origins-plus-plus.sprinter.descri: A speedster who dashes through life in a blur.
origin.origins-plus-plus.sprinter.name: Sprinter
origin.origins-plus-plus.stargazer.descr: A dreamer captivated by the infinite expanse of the stars.
origin.origins-plus-plus.stargazer.name: Stargazer
origin.origins-plus-plus.sunken_sailor.d: Legend has it that sunken sailors were once cruel pirates that died in terrible shipwrecks, but now they are just hollow souls left to wander a world they no longer fit into.
origin.origins-plus-plus.technomancer.de: Armed with the power and knowledge of the godfathers of technomancy, you are able to create spells using conduits and your staff.
origin.origins-plus-plus.thornling.descr: A small arcane creature, protected by a strange magical spell. You do not know where you came from; you just know you exist.
origin.origins-plus-plus.thornling.name: Thornling
origin.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian.des: A combat-hardened warrior of ancient lineage, unmatched in battle.
origin.origins-plus-plus.void_samurai.de: A human trapped in the void for what felt like an eternity, who has finally returned, (but only partially)...
origin.origins-plus-plus.voidling/suprem: You have slain 'The Beast,' and have grown stronger, learning to shape the void.
origin.origins-plus-plus.voidling/voidbo: A descendant of the void, you have received the gift of flight and the ability to escape the void, (but do not stray too far from home)... (Evolve with 'Free the End')
origin.origins-plus-plus.voidling/voidli: Born of the abyss, you are a creature of the Void now walking the material realm. (Evolve with 'Caves & Cliffs')
origin.origins-plus-plus.volcanic_dragon: A magnificent dragon formed from the raw energy of volcanoes.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wailing_one.des: Eerie banshees, harbingers of death whose presence and cries always bring death and are a reminder that all things must eventually end. They are feared by villagers and revered by illagers.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wanderer.descri: The sense of adventure and the excitement of new things guide you. You became a wanderer, learning many useful skills on the way.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wanderer.name: Wanderer
origin.origins-plus-plus.wandering_spiri: A spirit lost in the Overworld for reasons unknown to you. Your thoughts and memories, the only thing that linger from your past life.
origin.origins-plus-plus.war_god.descrip: Inspired by the war god in Passerine.
origin.origins-plus-plus.war_god.name: War God
origin.origins-plus-plus.warden.descript: A formidable warden bearing traits of its ancient ancestry.
origin.origins-plus-plus.warden.name: Warden
origin.origins-plus-plus.warforged.descr: Created as weapons of war, these sentient beings of wood and metal now seek purpose beyond battle.
origin.origins-plus-plus.warforged.name: Warforged
origin.origins-plus-plus.warper.descript: A master of teleportation, warp to your heart's content.
origin.origins-plus-plus.warper.name: Warper
origin.origins-plus-plus.witch_of_ink.de: Enlightened by 'The Canvas', your only purpose is to create a world made entirely of paint and simple colors.
origin.origins-plus-plus.withered_fox.de: These ancient creatures face extinction as hunters prize their rare hides.
origin.origins-plus-plus.withered_skelet: A sturdy Wither Skeleton, your rattling bones echo through the Nether.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wizard.descript: Once a humble villager, your wisdom and magic now serve the greater good.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wizard.name: Wizard
origin.origins-plus-plus.wyverian.descri: A proud descendant of the majestic wyvern, steeped in power.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wyverian.name: Wyverian
origin.origins-plus-plus.zero_aizawa.des: A powerful being, able to travel long distances and loved by everyone.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.brute.des: Summon a Piglin Brute in the Overworld. 'Submit!' will now deal even more damage.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.kill.desc: Let your minion score a kill.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.kill.name: Getting Stronger Every Day...
origins-plus-plus.advancements.petri.des: Obtain your first petrified heart from a hostile mob.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.root.name: A Eulogy for the Dead
Summon a Skeleton. 'Submit!' will now deal more damage.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.summon.de: Summon a mob to serve you!
origins-plus-plus.advancements.wither_sk: Summon a Wither Skeleton in the Overworld.
origins-plus-plus.anomaly.sleep_fail: Time is not relative to you, preventing you from sleeping!
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.coal: Your senses discovered a piece of coal.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.gold: Your senses discovered a chunk of gold.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.iron: Your senses discovered a chunk of iron.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.lapis: Your senses discovered some lapis lazuli.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.redstone: Your senses discovered some redstone dust.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.sleep_fail: You feel rested enough from your time as a part of the world.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.totem_of_un: Your senses discovered some sort of dusty miniature statue.

§fA dusty miniature statue made of §6gold §fwith §2emerald eyes§f.
Something tells you this should stay with you...§r
origins-plus-plus.book.mana_potions:
§nMana Potions:§r
You can drink mana potions to refill your mana. There are two types: the basic mana potion and the super mana potion.

§lBasic Potion:§r Honey Bottle in your offhand. §o(100 mana)§r
§lSuper Potion:§r Dragon Breath in your offhand. §o(250 mana)§r
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.absorpt:
§nAbsorption:§r
You can use this spell to temporarily get Absorption and Resistance!

Item: Golden Apple in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.darknes:
§nDarkness:§r
You can use this spell to give Slowness and Blindness to all nearby entities!

Item: Ink Sac in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.decay:
§nDecay:§r
You can inflict Wither and Slowness on everything nearby.

Item: Wither Rose in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.explosi:
§nExplosion:§r
You can summon a explosive salmon wherever you look.

Item: Gunpowder in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.lava_sp:
§nLava Sponge:§r
You can use this spell to absorb any lava around you.

Item: Magma Block in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.leviosa:
§nLeviosa:§r
You can use this spell to levitate everything nearby.

Item: Phantom Membrane in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.phase:
§nPhase:§r
You can phase through blocks with that spell. (Passive, drains mana over time).

Item: Glistering Melon Slice in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.repulsi:
§nRepulsion:§r
You can deal extra knockback.

Item: Slime ball in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.scorch:
§nScorch:§r
You can use this spell to burn your enemies.

Item: Blaze Powder in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.shatter:
§nShatter:§r
You can use this spell to break blocks around you, (not near unbreakable blocks).

Item: Netherite Pickaxe in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.strong_:
§nStrong Wolf:§r
You can summon a strong wolf. (You need to tame it, but it will not attack you)

Item: Bone Block in your offhand
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.welcome:
Welcome to the Dark Mage Origin!

There are some hidden spells, but they require specific items in your offhand to be cast. §o(Cast spells with [Primary] + [Shift])§r

You can also make mana potions to store extra mana.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.zoglins:
§nZoglins:§r
You can summon a few war zoglins. (They will hit you back if you attack them)

Item: Leather in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.deranged.sleep_fail: You feel a horrible sense of dread, so you decide not to sleep.
origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing.sleep_fail: You feel uncomfortable and are unable to sleep. Maybe try sleeping below Y=-20?
origins-plus-plus.end-mage.book.hidden_c:
§nHidden Crafts:§r

§lEnd Stone:§r
7 Cobblestone + 1 Sand + 1 Ender Pearl = 8 End Stone. (Shapeless)

§lChorus Flower:§r
7 Oak Saplings + 1 Purple Dye + 1 Ender Pearl = 7 Chorus Flowers. (Shapeless)
origins-plus-plus.end-mage.book.infinite:
§nInfinite Range:§r
If you hold an ender pearl in your offhand, you will be able to interact with blocks far away. (Passive, drains mana over time)
origins-plus-plus.end-mage.book.waypoint:
§nWaypoint:§r
Use [Primary + Shift] with a Nether Star in your offhand to mark a location, and [Primary] with a Nether Star in your offhand to teleport back to it!
origins-plus-plus.end-mage.book.welcome:
Welcome to the End Mage Origin!

There are some secrets, and you can also make mana potions to store extra mana.

§o(Cast spells with [Primary] + [Shift])§r.
origins-plus-plus.enigma.message: Don't speak to me or my son ever again!
origins-plus-plus.glacier.sleep_fail: It isn't cold enough for you to sleep
origins-plus-plus.kelperet.sleep_fail: You are too far from water to be able to sleep.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.accele:
§nAccelerate:§r
Apply Speed and Haste to all entities within a 6-block radius.

Item: Clock in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.army:
§nArmy:§r
You can summon several Snow Golems.

Item: Carved Pumpkin in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.blessi:
§nBlessing of the Sea:§r
Apply Water Breathing to all players within a 6-block radius.

Item: Heart of the Sea in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.bolt:
§nBolt:§r
You can summon lightning wherever you want. (Though you need to be exposed to the sky).

Item: Nether Star in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.devour:
§nDevour:§r
You can summon evoker fangs! Be careful because they can damage you too!

Item: Totem of Undying in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.experi:
§nExperience:§r
You can exchange quartz for experience.

Item: Quartz in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.exting:
§nExtinguish:§r
You can give Fire Resistance to you and anyone in a 6-block radius.

Item: Magma Cream in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.fireba:
§nFireball:§r
You can summon a motionless fireball.

Item: Blaze Rod in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.firewo:
§nFirework Magic:§r
You can summon a firework explosion wherever you want.

Item: Firework Star in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.fluctu:
§nFluctuate:§r
You can use this spell to send all entities within 6 blocks (including yourself) into the sky. You will also receive Slow Falling.

Item: Feather in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.illumi:
§nIllumine:§r
Apply Glowing to all entities in a 50 block radius and Night Vision to those in an 8-block radius.

Item: Glowstone Dust in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.lava_v:
§nLava Vision:§r
Be able to see better in lava. (Passive)

Item: Magma Cream in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.leap:
§nLeap:§r
You can use this spell to leap in the air.

Item: Rabbit Foot in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.pocket:
§nPocket Dimension:§r
This spell will replace all the basic spells.

Item: Lodestone in your offhand.

Use [Load Toolbar Activator] to create and reset your pocket dimension. §lIf you reset it, everything will be destroyed!§r

§nKeys:§r
Use [Primary] to go and [Secondary] to leave. Add [Shift] to take/bring back an entity within three block with you.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.poison:
§nPoison Garden:§r
You can summon a poison garden that will trap your enemies wherever you want.

Item: Flowering Azalea in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.repuls:
§nRepulsion:§r
Anyone who attacks you will be pushed away. (Passive)

Item: End Crystal in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.shield:
§nShield Sentinel:§r
You can summon two sentries to protect you; they will attack anything that moves.

Item: Shield in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.welcom:
Welcome to the Light Mage Origin!

There are some hidden spells, but they require specific items in your offhand to be cast. §o(Cast spells with [Primary] + [Shift])§r

You can also make mana potions to store extra mana.
Blessed with the protection of the Ender Dragon
origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian.sword.l: A blade personalized for the strength of a warrior
origins-plus-plus.mouse.lore: §fI have always been a wooden hoe... §4What are you talking about?§r
origins-plus-plus.mouse.name: Yoinked!
origins-plus-plus.rift-mage.message: You are venturing too far from your rift!
origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram.sleep_fail: You have to sleep above Y=70.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.black_con: Launch a hook to move around.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.blue_cond: Generates a healing aura capable of healing yourself and others.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.light_blu: Summon nanites to you that protect you from all attacks.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.lime_cond: Summon a metal cage to trap mobs or players in front of you.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.red_condu: Shoots lasers from your staff and destroys everything in its path.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.staff.lor: A powerful staff used as a medium to create spells with conduits...
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/a_: Touching kelp gives you Regeneration, Blindness, and Slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/dr: Dried Kelp fills you up more.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/ex: You are naturally three blocks tall.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/fi: Fire brings back bad memories, so you take extra fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/in: Being close to a gold block or soul sand gives you great speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/lo: You start to float whenever you are low on health (with no Slow Falling).
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/ne: You are weaker and slower in the Nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/pa: Dealing damage to wolves gives you Strength for a short while.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/po: Inflicts Poison on your opponent for a short period of time after hitting them.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/tr: You take increased damage from weapons enchanted with Bane of Arthropods.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/eternity: Time for you to learn what it takes to exist yet not exist simultaneously...
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/moons_gr: You belong in the night time! Take a leap, grab a sword, and use that moonlight to your advantage!
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/scorchin: The starlight in you greatly weakens you during the day; be careful until nightfall.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/supernov: Your body is made of pure energy, so you are slightly transparent, and you do not seem to have bones?.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/time_spa: Anomalies are highly unstable, but you can use this to your advantage; you can teleport to where you want to go.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/unstable: Due to your unstable state, your body will periodically fade away, causing hunger.
power.origins-plus-plus.artificial-const: You are a battery-powered machine. This battery slowly runs out over time. As the battery decreases, you will start to move slower until you cannot move at all. You can refill this battery by placing coal, charcoal, or redstone in your offhand.
You can shoot arrows from your offhand.
Since you are a machine, you cannot heal naturally, but you can heal yourself with iron nuggets (small increase) or iron/copper ingots (medium increase) in your offhand.
Due to a lot of your insides being made of slime and honey, you take slightly less fall damage.
Your outer shell is made of metal, so you additional armor and a grayish tint.
You are unable to eat, but your hunger will never reach zero. You are also immune to Poison.
Due to having pistons in your arms, you have extended reach.
You can store items in a chest-like compartment. These items do not drop on death.
You do not require air to survive, allowing you to survive underwater indefinitely.
You are much denser than water, making you sink.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/fireba: You have both a fire bar and a water bar. Make sure to watch these carefully!. Refill your fire bar by holding coal/charcoal/coal block/lava bucket and [Shift + Right-Click]. Refill your water bar by drinking water bottles or by holding a water bucket and [Shift + Right-Click].
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/power_: When you deplete any bar, you enter power saving mode.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/toggle: You can switch between fire and water attacks
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/undyin: You do not die, but you will power down when out of steam. (*You have a countdown bar that will deplete when you run out of steam and will replenish when you have steam. If it runs out, you will die.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/unnatu: You do not need to eat, and you cannot heal naturally either.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/water_: Be warned! This uses a lot of steam!
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/aquatic.d: You have Dolphin's Grace when underwater.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/lazy.desc: You gain Mining Fatigue when you have more than a stack of logs in your inventory.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/lazy.name: Lazy
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/logger.de: You gain Haste when near logs and stripped logs.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/rage.desc: You get Speed and Regeneration for a short time.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/rage.name: Beaver Rage
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/razor_tee: You deal extra damage due to your sharp teeth
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/storage.d: You can store precious items in your mouth that do not drop on death.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bedro: You are so dense and heavy that when you fall greater than four blocks, you break the block you fall on (except for some strong blocks).
Since you are stronger than most, you can break bedrock with a netherite pickaxe.
You are nearly unbreakable because of your bedrock ancestors, so you are immune to drowning and starvation. You also are a darker tint due to being bedrock.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bow.d: Due to your short arms, you cannot pull back a bow or crossbow.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bulky: You are bulky, so you sink underwater and gain Slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/dense: Due to your density, you have extra health, and you are slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/fast_: You were built to mine so you mine faster.
You heal differently than most, so you have a constant heal, but half a heart each second and a half.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/heavy: Due to your great weight, you can barely jump a block high.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/immob: Like your ancestors, you can be immune to all damage; however, when you do this, it costs you your speed and strength, and it takes much longer to heal.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/knowi: Your familiarity with the earth allows you to find treasures others cannot.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/lava_: Since you are accustomed to being covered in lava, you have adjusted to be able to see in it.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/no_el: Due to your great density, you could never fly.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/no_fo: You never have eaten so you never have a full food bar.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/potio: Your skin is too hard for potions to get through and affect you.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/power: Due to your great strength, you can launch mobs into the air when you hit them.
You are a block tall because you used to be a block.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/sleep: You got plenty of rest while you sat at the bottom of the world; why would you need any more?
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/spawn: You spawn in the Nether where there is twice as much bedrock.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/stron: Due to you being made out of bedrock, you deal extra damage when using your fist.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/sun_w: The sun is too bright for your cave-adapted eyes.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/blast_: Binturongs are weak to explosion damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/camouf: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can camouflage into your surroundings to become invisible, but use hunger doing so.
Binturongs deal extra damage with their sharp claws.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/flamma: Binturongs hide is very flammable, so it causes them extra damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/jockey: You can ride on other players.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/jump_b: Binturongs can jump higher than average.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/leap.d: Binturongs can leap from tree to tree with a powerful jump.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/less_b: Binturongs need to save energy for leaping, so they cannot hold their breath for long.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/manic_: Binturong's claws allow them to break blocks faster than others.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/noctur: Binturongs are adapted to the night, so they have permanent night vision.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/small_: Being a quadruped, binturongs are smaller than average.
Binturongs have a need for speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/sugar_: Binturongs can snort red dye for some reason.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/thick_: A binturong's thick hide means that they are immune to all types of thorns and spikes.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/too_he: Binturongs are too weak to wear netherite armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/almost_no_a: Birb is very tiny which makes it hard for it to wear any armor apart from leather, gold, chainmail, and iron chestplates.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/feather_gri: Due to your weak wings, you cannot load bows or crossbows normally, which makes the amount of damage you do with arrows way less.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/granivore.d: As a birb, you prefer to eat seeds instead of other food, so you can only eat seeds.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/jockey.desc: You can ride on other players.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/jockey.name: Jockey
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/launch.desc: You can flap your wings to send you forward.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/launch.name: Flap
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/love_air.de: You love flying so much that you learnt how to use it to your full potential; you deal twice the damage while flying; however, you deal very little damage while on the ground.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/small.descr: Birbs are small; you are a birb so you are small and have natural wings!
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/small.name: Small Birb
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/smaller_app: As a small birb, you eat less.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/tweet.descr: [Save Toolbar Activator] Birbs love to repeat what other things near them say, and now with that ability, they can find where the sound is coming from to know where things are nearby!
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/tweet.name: Tweet
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/blazing_: Launch yourself into the air and gain Slow Falling until you hit the ground.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/charge_b: Throw a flurry of fire charges.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/cold_her: When in a cold environment, you are majorly slowed, and are inflicted with Weakness II.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/fortress: You spawn in a Nether Fortress.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/hot_hand: You cannot use bows, crossbows, or tridents.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/no_place: When in the Nether you have Speed II, Strength, and no mobs will attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/overworl: You gain Weakness when you are in the Overworld.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/particle: Flame particles emit from your body.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/punch.de: Your body is made up of flames, so it can set enemies on fire just by punching them, and you have flames around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/amethyst_ea: You can eat amethyst blocks, clusters, and shards—due to thinking they are a part of you.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/blob_creatu: You are as tall as a Husk, but you have fewer hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/colour.name: Pinkish
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/electrical_: Somehow, lightning goes right through you without dealing any damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/frozen_feet: When in cold biomes, you gain Speed because your jelly-like skin freezes (and so is a lot more stable to walk with).
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/heal.descri: [Save Toolbar Activator] Increase your health bar by gaining temporary Slowness and Blindness.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/heal.name: Heal
Although you still use normal hearts, your health has been replaced by a health bar. Using abilities or getting hit causes the bar to go down a constant amount.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/magic.descr: You can shoot out a part of yourself (this costs 20% of your max health).
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/magic.name: Own Self
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/melting_han: Your hands start to melt in hot biomes, making you weaker.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/nether_weak: The Nether is a new place for you, so your hands get a bit weaker from the stress that it gives you.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/no_lungs.de: Although you are weak in water, you do not drown in it because you do not need to breathe.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/paranoia.de: You are so paranoid that when you are hit, you get a short speed boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/side_step.d: Double-tapping a movement key will dash in that direction.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/stacking_at: Your attacks stack up to [3] times. At three stacks, your next attack deals more damage and resets stacks to one. Stacks will also reset after some time of not attacking.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/storage.des: You can store things inside yourself that do not drop on death.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/strength.de: You are stronger when your health bar is more than half full.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/water_effec: When wet, you start transforming into some kind of puddle, making you slower and hungrier.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/wisdom.desc: You receive 175% more XP from all sources. [Right-Click] while holding a book to gain [20] experience points.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/wisdom.name: Wisdom
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/delicio: The smell of bacon encourages your attackers to deal far more damage. Be careful around fire!
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/glutton: All food is far more saturating.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/hog_sou: Being in Hog-Wild state will play audio cues every once in a while.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/hog_wil: If at or below half health, you will enter a rage state, boosting both your speed and attack damage.
Your lack of fingers prevents you from using shields and projectile weapons.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/overwei: Your unhealthy appetite has you move slower than usual.
Your base attack damage is much higher than average.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/tough.d: Your thick skin and weight reduces any received knockback or projectile damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/clim: [Save Toolbar Activator] You are able to climb up any kind of wall, not just ladders.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/cobw: Attack a target in a cobweb, using your fist to feed yourself.
You are able to collect cobwebs with your bare hands.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/curs: You take increased damage that ignores armor from weapons enchanted with Bane of Arthropods.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/exos: Like spiders, you are equipped with an exoskeleton—a hard, external covering that provides both structural support and protection from predators.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/extr: Because of your ancestry, you get extra hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/long: With their powerful legs, spiders can run faster and jump farther. While sprinting, they can also jump higher.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/mast: You navigate cobwebs perfectly and are able to climb in them. When you hit an enemy in melee, they get stuck in a cobweb for a while. Non-arthropods stuck in cobwebs will be sensed by you. You are able to craft cobwebs from string.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/mine: You spawn in an Abandoned Mineshaft.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/pois: Your body does not react to poison as it is immune to it.
You release venom at the touch. Inflicting Poison on others when you hit them.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/silk: [Load Toolbar Activator] You trap every player and mob in a 10-block radius in a cobweb.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/spid: You naturally take slightly less damage.
Spiders and Cave Spiders are all your allies and will not attack you.
Your anatomy allows you to be stronger.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/summ: You can summon friendly cave spiders.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/web_: Launch a web in the direction you are facing. Deals damage if it lands on the same block as an entity. (You cannot wear boots and must be on the ground for it to work).
power.origins-plus-plus.calamitous-rogue: Killing the Wither, the Ender Dragon, illagers, and Iron Golems gives you bonus emeralds. However, other entities have a 20% chance to not drop anything.
Big Game Hunter
The villagers put a bounty on you, so they will not trade with you unless you use 'Smooth Talk' on them.
Bounty Target
As an assassin, you suffer from reduced damage if your stealth bar is not full.
Bad DPS
Place a marker at your feet. If you get a kill on anything while sneaking, teleport back instantly.
Secrets of the Trade
You have a 33% chance to instantly restore [1] durability of your weapon when hitting something (unless the weapon is one hit away from breaking).
Weapon Expert
Iron Golems will attack you the moment you break crops near them.
Infamous
[Shift + Right-Click] a villager to raise your reputation with them, letting you trade even despite Bounty Target. If a villager is nearby after 10 seconds, Iron Golems will begin hunting you.
Smooth Talker
When not attacking or taking damage, you slowly fade into shadows, eventually becoming invisible.
Stealth

Strikes while in stealth mode reset your bar but gain an extra effect based on your held item:
- Axes shatter shields, dealing heavy damage to the item.
- Shields stun the victim for a short time and breaks their flight (if any).
- Swords strip any health-increasing status effects from the target.
- Tridents (melee only) deal drowning damage after a short delay.
Ambush
Ambush strikes make your victim glow for a medium duration for you.
Thrill of the Hunt
Your stealth bar refills instantly after scoring a kill.
Without a Trace
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/cake: You are able to craft a cake with nine sugar in a crafting table.
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/cook: You are able to craft a cookie with four sugar in a crafting table.
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/favo: Eating cookies gives you more saturation than normal.
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/hard: Temporarily get Resistance, but lose some food points.
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/suga: You do not take damage from sweet berry bushes.
You start with some sugar-related items.
Craft [9] sugar with nine sweet berries in a crafting table.
When you have sugar in your offhand, you eat it and get sugar effects.
power.origins-plus-plus.child-of-cthulhu: You change the color of your skin if you are in water or on land.
Fire represents everything you are against so it deals significantly more damage to you.
You can launch yourself in the air, in the direction you are looking at.
You can switch between small, normal and large sizes.
Since you have grown used to water, you get Slowness on land (when it is not raining).
You are granted with permanent Water Breathing.
You are made to hunt monsters on foreign worlds; thus, you do not need oxygen.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/chimeri: You are heavily mutated and made for high-risk combat; you avoid using shields as they slow you down. Fire is something you need to deal with as you are critically weak to it.
Let loose your bioweapon to rot away whatever caught your ire.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/no_food: You are made to directly absorb material to repair yourself. Hurting something will restore hunger; however, you cannot eat normal food as you are a synthetic creature.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/phase_s: You teleport after taking damage (up to once per minute).
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/schrodi: Your HP is cut in half under the sun, as it is uncertain if your biology is living or dead.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/unstabl: Made to adapt, you take in potion effects one level stronger; however, this also applies to negative ones, as you seem to be defective.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/xenite_: Eldritch metal cancels out any G-forces on your body, making you immune to fall damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/cobras_tou: To defend yourself, you poison people you attack.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/cold_resou: You do not like cold. Staying in a cold place will start to lower your temperature. A 'Cold' bar will start to increase. Having some Cold will give you Slowness plus slightly blue skin. Reaching max Cold will increase the Slowness level and blue tone, and you will start to take damage. Cold will naturally decrease after leaving the cold place.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/green_skin: Your skin has turned green from the mass of scales covering your body.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/poison_sho: Shoots a Poison Arrow wherever you are looking at.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/scale_armo: Your scales provide natural protection, giving you a slight armor boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/strength_i: You are naturally stronger because of the heat; you gain Strength during the day and in the Nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/def: You have a small permanent armor boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/ext: You have slightly more health than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/no_: You cannot eat regular food. Instead, you can consume copper by placing it in your offhand. Raw copper gives [2] points, copper ingots give [3], and copper blocks (+ non-oxidized variants) give [10].
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/oxi: You oxidize over time in three stages. The more oxidized you are, the slower and weaker you will become. Place honeycomb in your offhand, and it will be consumed to undo oxidation.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/sma: You are naturally half a block tall.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/str: You have a small permanent damage boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.corrupted-wither: Even though you are a skeleton, you still somehow need food and need it often...
You warp to another dimension, becoming invulnerable to any kind of damage, and become invisible. When entering/exiting the dimension, you emit a sound.
You can cause any nearby projectiles to warp and slow down, allowing you to dodge them with ease.
You are a Wither Skeleton and thus deal an extra heart of damage with any type of sword.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/axe.de: Learning from your family, you learnt how to use axes more proficiently than others.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/crafti: Due to your specialization in crafting, you do not require a crafting table to craft, being able to summon a crafting GUI.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/fire.d: Spending your time in the forge, you became immune to heat and fire. You still take damage in lava.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/pillag: You take more damage from your natural enemy, the Pillagers.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/undead: However much you train, you are not able to get over your fear of the undead.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/villag: You lived a sheltered life; you never left the village growing up, so you spawn in a village.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/damage: You deal significantly less physical damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/disloc: You can teleport anywhere within a 25-block range.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/health: You have much less health than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/mage_b: [Primary] + [Shift] You can turn a book in your offhand into a Mage Spell Book.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/recove: [Secondary + Shift] Use mana to heal yourself.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/resour: You have a mana bar that can be used to cast spells. If you run out of mana, you die.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/carry: [Shift + Left-Click] a minion to turn it into a Petrified Heart again.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/comma: Single out a mob for all of your minions to target.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/disco: Your blood sacrifices reduced your max health. Summoning minions reduces it even further if you stay near them.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/equip: Your minions will automatically pick up items on the ground to use as gear.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/freez: [Shift + Right-Click] a minion to make it wait for you patiently, freezing it in place. Do it again to unfreeze a minion.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/join_: Mobs you summon will not attempt to attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/night: Your SOUL bar regenerates slowly at night.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/no_me: You barely deal any damage with swords and axes.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/no_tr: Villagers refuse to trade with you.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/petri: Most hostile mobs you kill drop petrified hearts, containing their vital data. SOUL is needed to summon bound mobs.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/small: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can fire a ray of dark energy at will to deal light magic damage. The damage increases as your expertise in necromancy increases.
Like all occultists, you use SOUL energy for your demonic rituals. Accumulate it by killing mobs.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/speci: Sacrifice your vitality to command your nearby minions (within 8 blocks) to unleash a unique ability (depending on what mob they are). Requires your SOUL to be higher than 50%, but does not consume SOUL.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/summo: Using the power of [5] SOUL Energy and a petrified heart in your hand, summon its bound mob to serve you. Some mobs have special abilities that can be used at will.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/take_: When at least two minions are nearby, they will sacrifice themselves to protect you from a fatal hit, dying to do so.
As you are a (half) god, you are cursed by the underworld when you are in the Nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/fire.de: Fire represents demons (your adversaries), so you take extra fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/god_pun: You are a skilled soldier, and therefore you possess abilities to gain Strength for a short while.
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/god_spe: Because of your nature, you are naturally faster than most (when not in the Nether).
Because you are descended from gods, you have extra health.
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/more_bo: You are weakened and take more damage from the gods themselves (the bosses).
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/phase.d: You can pass through blocks (but it is too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/raw_die: You can only eat raw food.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/arrow_e: Any arrow you shoot will inflict Slowness II on the target.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/breathi: You calm yourself, empty your mind, and then start to breathe. Breathing decreases your derangement bar by [25].
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/dart.de: You can launch three darts anywhere in the direction you are looking. This dart will cause Slowness II.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/derange: Killing something increases your derangement bar by [25]. That's pretty gross, man...

You have a derangement bar; there are different effects for different levels of derangement. You fill up your derangement bar by killing something. However, to decrease your derangement bar, you use your breathing ability.
When your derangement bar is over or equal to [75], you will go insane. While insane, you deal extra damage, but your mental state is so broken that you are only left with much less health.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/knife_l: You have an obsessive love for sharp and pointy things such as knives, so you became well versed in how to fight with them. The damage you do with swords adds an extra heart of damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/migrain: The world looks a little bit different when you are insane. Literally.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/nightma: You have horrible nightmares when you fall asleep, so you have stopped sleeping altogether.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/persuas: You have learnt to convince and persuade many people over the years. Now, you can now use this to haggle with villagers to lower your prices.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/tranqui: When your derangement bar is lesser than or equal to [25], it will put you in a tranquil state. While tranquil, you are as fit as a fiddle. Being tranquil gives you Speed II and Jump Boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.devine-architect: Many have attempted to steal your powers through attempts on your life. You have become paranoid, unable to trade with villagers and unable to interact with some passive and neutral mobs. Iron Golems have grown wary of your presence through the years; now they attack you on sight!
Distrust

You mine end materials faster than others, and you can always pick up end blocks regardless of the tool you are using. You can also craft stone tools, brewing stands, furnaces, and levers with end stone.
Resourceful
[Load Toolbar Activator] Teleport to your exact position in the End.
Dimensional Traveler (End)
Your energy is shown. You use this to activate the Universal Blast. This fills faster at night than during the day.
Energy
You can float (but it is too exhausting to fly for long).
Float
The bosses are jealous of your abilities and wish to obtain them—even if they have to kill you to do so... (Bosses do more damage to you).
Jealousy
[Save Toolbar Activator] Teleport to your exact position in the Nether.
Dimensional Traveler (Nether)
You can see better at night.
Night Vision
You can pass through blocks (but it is too unstable to phase for long).
Phase
You can shoot a beam of condensed universal energy.
Universal Blast
Regeneration works differently for your kind.
Unnatural Regeneration
Since you are in the water so much, you get bubble particles around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/fish_die: You can only eat fish, but it gives a lot more hunger bars than usual.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/ocean_sp: Your natural spawn is in the ocean.
Like a dolphin, you can jump out of the water.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/slow_lan: Because you are not used to being on land, you get Slowness and Weakness while not in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/speed_wa: Dolphins are really fast swimmers, causing you to have Speed II while in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/summon_d: Dolphins usually travel in groups, causing you to be able to spawn a dolphin.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/water_br: Due to the way your lungs are formed, you can hold your breath underwater permanently.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/water_vi: Dolphins can see underwater due to the way their eyes were made.
power.origins-plus-plus.drakonwither/wit: You are immune to the Wither effect thanks to your (part) wither heritage.
You can shoot a wither skull where you are looking.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/abiliti: [Load Toolbar Activator] You can stab a chain into your enemies, dealing bleed damage.
Conjure a speedy nightmare steed that will either last two minutes or will die when you die.
You can shoot the skulls of your enemies laced with the soul of a creeper.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/buffs/f: Even your presence is scary, making enemies blinded with fear.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/buffs/k: You always carry items with you gathered on your journeys as a horseman.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/buffs/n: Your way stronger during the night due to your mission to hunt down souls; however, the daytime weakens you, making your thirst for souls insatiable.
As a horseman, you cannot eat anything—only being able to absorb the souls in soul campfires and soul lanterns to give you nutrients.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/debuffs: When hit, you have a chance of dropping bones.
Any items imbued with a curse can seal you inside the weapon when you are hit and kill you.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/bac: [Load Toolbar Activator] Leave your spiritual form, becoming one with the rock once more.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/ign: You are as heavy as a rock. You immediately sink upon being in contact with water.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/inv: You are close to invisible to the human eye.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/pha: You are in your spiritual form, so you can phase through blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/roc: Your skin has adapted itself to look like stone.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/spi: As a spirit-being you are faster than the average person, but you deal almost no damage.
Everything you see is desaturated until you take form again.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/sto: Being rock-like, you become one with the rocks. You gain Strength, Resistance, and Slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/swi: [Load Toolbar Activator] Leave your rock body and become spiritual.
Your Blood Meter fills up with every kill; upon reaching a certain number of kills, you will unlock abilities, but you will lose those abilities if the Blood Meter drops down below the set value for that ability. You lose blood by taking damage; this is called 'Bleeding'.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/distor: Gives Blindness and Nausea to players within 5 blocks. Kill [120] mobs to use this ability.
You are able to dodge and teleport back. Kill [100] mobs to use this ability.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/ebon_e: You have natural Fire Resistance and Speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/fly.de: You can launch yourself into the sky. Kill [100] mobs to use this ability.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/last_r: When you die, you cause an explosion.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/nether: As you feel more at home in the crimson forest, your natural spawn becomes the Nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/resist: Due to the nature of your abilities, you have grown immune to the effects of Wither, Nausea, and Blindness.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/smite_: You take significantly increased damage that ignores armor from weapons enchanted with smite.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/uncomf: It is impossible for you to sleep above Y=-20.
You gain wings that make you immune to fall damage and allow you to glide. Kill [100] mobs to use this ability.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/wither: [Save Toolbar Activator] Gives Wither effect to players within 5 blocks. Kill [120] mobs to use this ability.
power.origins-plus-plus.emblazing-warrio: At [3] Fury, you can no longer see your health.
Clouded Judgement
At [3] Fury, you will begin burning.
Red Hot Chili

You are able to unleash a strong attack in an X-shaped cross in front of you, dealing damage to everything inside, including you. The attack's shape will change to a '+'-shaped cross upon reaching [3] Fury.
X-Slash
You get hungry faster than the average person.
Demanding Lifestyle
X-Slash deals less damage to you than to other mobs. You also take less damage from being set on fire. With [3] Fury, you will not take damage from X-Slash or burning.
Burning Blood
For each 25% HP lost, you will gain fury, which increases all of your powers' effectiveness.
Flaming Fury

Whenever you attack with at least [1] Fury, there is a 33% chance to ignite mobs to your left or right side. At [2] Fury, this will ignite enemies on both sides at a 66% chance. At [3] Fury, the chance of this activating increases to 95%.
Ignition
You take slightly more damage from entities if you have less than [2] Fury.
Uncontrollable
The higher your fury is, the more damage you deal with attacks.
Torrent of Abuse
In the world you came from, you never earned EXP from killing mobs. You gain coins instead; after you gain enough coins, you can get an emerald.
Different World
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/end_rag: [Secondary + Shift] You can give Strength and Speed to everyone within a 6-block radius.
You have slightly fewer hearts than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/mage_bo: You can turn a book into an End Book using [Primary + Shift] with a book in your offhand.
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/resourc: You have a mana bar; if you run out of mana, you die. Mana Bugs will teleport to you if your mana is low.
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/telekin: You can use telekinesis to attack your enemies.
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/telepor: You can teleport wherever you want (within 50 blocks).
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/tp_to_y: [Primary + Shift] You can teleport targeted players/mobs/items to you (within 50 blocks).
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/behind_yo: [Save Toolbar Activator] Nothing can evade you... Use this ability to teleport behind anyone.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/clone.des: Summon a clone at your place and become invisible. If it is hit, become visible again and create an explosion that deals damage at the clone, killing it. Press the same key while your clone is alive to kill it.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/hated.des: They all betray us. Villagers will not trade with us, and we cannot tame anyone.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/no_fighti: You can only stare people down to death. No swords or axes...! You can punch people to death too, though.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/phase.des: You can pass through blocks (but it is too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/sight.des: Sneak to see all players, even through walls. You also have permanent night vision.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/staring.d: Staring at an entity for a long enough time will kill it. When you begin looking at it, it will be afflicted with Slowness and Weakness. Later on, your stare will inflict Blindness and Nausea. This can be toggled on/off with [Load Toolbar Activator].
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/arm: You have strong arms and can mine stone with your fist.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/blo: Due to your demonic nature, you are strong.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/dea: You can shoot a wither skull.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/ely: After you died, you lost your wings, but you will soon find out that you no longer need them as you can still fly...
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/fir: The feel of fire brings you back to your supposed-to-be torture in hell, so you take more damage from fire.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/fra: You have slightly fewer hearts than a human sue to all the torture in hell.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/glo: You are glowing due to your immense demonic energy.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/has: You are very strong, giving you Haste.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/imm: You are immune to Wither, Poison, Nausea, and Instant Damage from enduring so much pain in hell.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/roo: The thought of being back in that horrid place still haunts you, so you do not like to be under roofs, being a little slower in such cases.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/tra: You are Translucent due to you being a demon.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/vel: You can launch yourself due to your forced conditioning in Hell, forming a withering dust cloud as you launch.
power.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian/feline: Your legs not only make you jump higher but let you run faster.
power.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian/ravens: Your raven heart allows you to camouflage and become invisible when shifting.
power.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian/scaven: Your scavenger nature allows you to find ways to store items and preserve them.
power.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian/unholy: Your raven-like aura makes your skin dark and black. It also scares away any pets, and villagers will not trade with you.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/bloodsuckin: By punching your victims (while NOT crouched), you can drain their blood and receive healing, saturation, or a small buff. This is your only way to feed.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/diseased_bi: By punching your victims while crouched, you can afflict them with a random negative effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/inch_tall.d: You are extremely short. Drink some milk. Or blood. Either works. Actually, no, only blood does.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/jockey.desc: You can ride on other players.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/jockey.name: Jockey
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/nimble.desc: Being small has its perks. Prickly plants, high falls, and crash landings do not hurt you.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/nimble.name: Nimble
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/small_heart: Being a miserable tiny insect means you only have four hearts of health.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/small_stoma: You do not need much food to keep going.
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/burn.descri: When you are exposed to the sun, you will dehydrate and start to burn if exposed for too long. You can rehydrate in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/burn.name: Dehydration
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/dash.name: Jump
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/poison.desc: Your skin produces a toxin that you can use to poison others.
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/poison.name: Powerful Toxin
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/floral_supe: You gain Regeneration, Saturation and Speed when around a group of three or more flowers. (Does not work with Torch Flowers, Pitcher Plants, Pink Petals or Spore Blossoms).
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/floral_team: Your bond with flowers means they give you a unique effect when you are around them (within 4 blocks): Allium (Levitation), Azure Bluet (Glowing), Blue Orchid (Conduit Power), Cornflowers (Night Vision), Dandelions (Haste II), Poppies (Regeneration II), Lily of the Valley (Absorption), Orange Tulip (Fire Resistance), Oxeye Daisy (Resistance II), Pink Tulip (Jump Boost), Red Tulip (Strength), Sunflower (Hero of The Village), White Tulip (Invisibility), Wither Rose (Strength II), Peonies (Health Boost). Rose Bushes and Lilacs don’t grant any effect but still function with Floral Superiority.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/fungal_enem: Although you created them, you are not exactly friends with Fungi, and they hinder you when nearby. Brown Mushroom: Mining Fatigue, Red Mushroom: Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/light_as_a_: You are as light as a flower giving you permanent Slow Falling.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/natures_dan: You take more damage from drowning, withering, and burning.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/photosynthe: You can regain hunger from the sun.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/prickly.des: You have natural thorns, both allowing you to damage attackers, and scale blocks.
You are naturally smaller in size, being the size of a lovely rose.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/thorned_pun: You have thorns all over your body, and the ones on your fists are designed to have a weak poison. This effect only triggers when punching with no items in hand.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/fire_charg: You are able to shoot a fireball. The cooldown is drastically reduced in the Nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/float.desc: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can float (but it is too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/float.name: Float
Your melee attacks are weaker due to your depressed nature.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/nether_pha: Being a ghost, you can phase through most blocks (though you can only do this in the Nether).
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/tall.descr: You are slightly taller than the average player.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/tall.name: Tall
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/armor.desc: Leather armor gives you as much protection as iron armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/armor.name: Giant Heritage
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/big.descri: You are twice the size of a regular person.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/big.name: Super-Sized
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/bow.descri: You are unable to use any ranged weapons or shields.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/bow.name: Excessive Power
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/breath.des: You have much more oxygen than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/health.des: You have much more health than a human.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/limbs.desc: You jump higher, have  more reach, projectiles go twice as far, and you do not slip on ice.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/limbs.name: Long Limbs
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/mount.desc: Other players can ride on top of you, you can pick up mobs, and you can throw your passenger.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/mount.name: Piggyback
You are unaffected by Levitation but are incapable of using an elytra.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/slam.descr: You can slam into the ground, creating a small explosion and throwing off passengers.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/slam.name: Colossal Slam
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/sleep.desc: You need to put four beds together to sleep.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/sleep.name: Gigantic Bed
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/slow.name: Unwieldy Arms
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/spider.des: You take much more damage from arthropods.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/strong.des: You deal more melee damage and more knockback.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/sturdy.des: You take less fall damage and less knockback and mine faster.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/swim.descr: You fall faster than normal, cannot float in water, and cannot ride any animals or vehicles.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/swim.name: Heavy
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/chilly_p: If you are inside powder snow, you do not take freezing damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_blo: When in hot biomes and the Nether, you cannot use your special abilities.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_fee: You are able to walk on water by turning it into ice.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_nap: You cannot sleep when it is not cold enough. The head of your bed needs to be adjacent to at least three blocks that belong to snow or ice block tags.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_pro: Powder Snow drops your temperature down enough for you to survive in hot environments for a few minutes.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_ski: Your cold nature makes your skin blue.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/fire_dam: You take much more fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/freezing: When you deal critical damage, your touch temporarily freezes the target. If the target is resistant to fire, it takes 2.5 hearts from it.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/harvest_: You are able to collect Snow and Ice with your bare hands. However, you still need to use a bucket to collect Powder Snow.
You do not like the sun's hot rays, which makes you weaker during the day.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/icy_brea: You can breathe ice, freezing enemies and dealing a little bit of damage to them.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/icy_defe: Due to you having to exercise to keep yourself warm, you have a small armor bonus.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/icy_spaw: You spawn in a snowy biome.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/multi_sn: If you throw a snowball when sneaking, it is split into 10. Snowballs also do more damage to opponents.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/night_pe: You like the cold night, making you powerful at night time.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/overheat: When in a hot biome, you become slower and weaker, and you start dying. You can prevent this by getting inside powder snow, drinking a Fire Resistance potion, or staying in water; however, you will still be slow and weak.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/snow_dam: Falling on snow prevents you from taking fall damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/snowy_sp: When on snow and ice, you are able to run extremely fast.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/carrion_ea: You do not suffer from the Hunger status effect, and in fact benefit from it.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/carrion_sa: You do not suffer from the Hunger status effect, and in fact benefit from it.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/large_buil: You tower over humans, making their armor too small for you.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/night_visi: When exposed to moonlight, you can see clearly at night.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/rage.descr: Being reduced to under half your health will send you into a rage, increasing your knockback resistance, speed, and toughness.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/rage.name: Rage
power.origins-plus-plus.golden-golem/ext: You have a small damage bonus.
power.origins-plus-plus.golden-golem/gol: You take on a gold-like color.

You have a power bar that goes up to ten. With [Primary], you can use three to increase speed temporarily, or with [Primary + Shift], you can use five to increase strength. If the bar is max, it is like holding a totem of undying.
You gain extra buffs depending on how much health you have.
power.origins-plus-plus.golden-golem/hea: You have a bar that will heal you if above 20 (up to 50). Getting hit lowers the bar by [5]. You have no need to eat. You can spend 20 power to use an ability that gives you Resistance and Slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.golden-golem/wat: You sink in water. You will also move slower; however, you will not drown.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/absorben: Since your body passively absorbs water over time, being in water causes you to become slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/condensi: You are able to condense yourself to a quarter your usual size, but due to your high density (and smaller legs), you become slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/flammabl: Your chemical composition makes you extremely flammable, and thus you take increased fire damage and can only be put out with water or powder snow.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/gooey_bo: Thanks to your body being an in-between of a solid and a liquid, it is more difficult to hurt you, and you take less damage from physical attacks and projectiles.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/gooey_fi: Because you are not entirely solid, you deal reduced damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/gooey_sk: Your gooey skin makes you green and somewhat translucent.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/ignitabl: You cannot wear iron armor or above in deserts, the Nether, and other hot biomes or else risk being set on fire from the heat. You can protect yourself from this by enchanting your armor with Fire Protection.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/no_lungs: Having to survive in space, you have adapted to have no need to breathe air and are able to go underwater without the fear of drowning.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/splat.de: You take less velocity damage, but if the potential damage is severe enough, you become slow while you try to put yourself back together.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/sticky_g: With your sticky skin, you are able to climb walls.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/stomach_: You have increased saturation from meats thanks to how your body breaks down the matter, and you do not get Hunger or Poison status effects. (You have no natural regeneration, and you will always be at half hunger—eating food directly refills your hearts. You cannot eat when you are at full health).
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/unwieldy: Your non-solid skin means that you cannot use shields or any ranged weapons.
power.origins-plus-plus.half-wither/exha: Because your body is half-wither, your soul needs more energy to stay stable.
power.origins-plus-plus.half-wither/immu: You are immune to the effects of other withers.
